Before joining Nanjing University in 2019, I was a postdoc working at Aarhus Univeristy (CASA), advised by Prof. Anders MÃ¸ller. I received my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from University of New South Wales (CORG) in 2017, advised by Prof. Jingling Xue, and B.Eng. degree in Software Engineering from Northwestern Polytechnical University in 2013. Teaching Software Analysis/Static Program Analysis: Fall 2025, Fall 2024, Fall 2023, Fall 2022, Fall 2021, Fall 2020, Spring 2020 Principles and Techniques of Compilers: Spring 2025, Spring 2023, Spring 2022 Research Interests I am particularly interested in developing program analysis techniques and tools for solving the problems in the fields of programming language, software engineering, and security.
